text.div:
eICR Processing Error Reason Codes

If the incoming eICR was not processed by the PHA system (or its intermediary), will contain the reason it was not processed.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://acme.org/cdc-codes
    CodeDisplay
    eicr-fatalEICR FATAL (TEMPORARY CODE)

name: eICR Processing Error Reason Codes
description: If the incoming eICR was not processed by the PHA system (or its intermediary), will contain the reason it was not processed.
